Package domain

Interface Thing

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ant, Cane, Carnivorous, Cell, Conway, Flower, Sand, Water
public interface Thing
Represents an interface for entities in the garden grid.

  • Method Details

    • act

      void act()
      Defines the action to be performed by the thing during a time step.

    • getColumn

      int getColumn()
      Gets the column position of the entity in the colony grid.
      Returns:
      The column position of the entity.

    • getRow

      int getRow()
      Gets the row position of the thing in the garden grid.
      Returns:
      The row position of the thing.

    • shape

      default int shape()
      Every thing will be a shape in SQUARE for default
      Returns:
      SQUARE

    • getColor

      default Color getColor()
      Gets the color of the thing.
      Returns:
      The color of the thing, which is by default set to Color.blue.

    • is

      default boolean is()
      Checks if the thing is present.
      Returns:
      true if the thing is present, false otherwise.
